scripts.init: yarn install && cd app && yarn install && flow; cd - && run start
scripts.new:component:
touch source/sass/components/$c.sass app/src/$c.js && printf "// $c @flow import React, { Component } from 'react' import './styles/$c.css' export default class $c extends Component { render() { return

$c

} }" >> app/src/$c && printf "// $c " >> source/sass/components/$c.sass
scripts.new:helper:
touch app/src/helpers/$h.js && printf "// helpers/$h @flow import React from 'react' export default function $h(props) { return

$h

}"
scripts.new:view:
touch source/sass/layouts/$v.sass app/src/views/$v.js && printf "// views/$v @flow import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../styles/$v.css' export default class $v extends Component { render() { return

$v

} }" >> app/src/views/$v && printf "// layouts/$v " >> source/sass/layouts/$v.sass
